VIII.iii.6.A.1.d
.
Action to Take When the Veteran Claims Participation in SHAD Testing but Does Not Claim a Disability
A claim is not substantially complete if a Veteran alleges participation in SHAD testing during service, but does not claim service connection (SC) for a specific disability.Â  In cases such as these, follow the procedures for handling an incomplete application at
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C.2.b and c
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section A - Developing Claims Based on Participation in Project Shipboard Hazard and Defense (SHAD)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section A
